Techinical Specs
Requirements

For optimal performance, we recommend using the most up-to-date version of any operating system and app.

  • Apple iOS 12 or newer (must support Bluetooth 4.0)
  • Android 8.0 or newer (must support Bluetooth 4.0) with Google Play, Google Services
  • Broadband internet connection (2Mbps upload recommended)
  • Wi-Fi
  • Available power outlet
Tech Spec

Size: 5.91x4.72x8.86 inches (15x12x22.5cm)
Weight: 2.1 pounds (950g)
Camera: 1080p HD, 160Â° wide-angle lens, 4x digital zoom, automatic night vision
Audio: Built-in speaker, high-quality microphone
Treat capacity: 100 pieces
Recommended treat: Round shaped treats with a diameter around 0.4 inches(1cm)
Power: 100-240V, 5V2A
Connectivity: 2.4GHz Wi-Fi (802.11 b/g/n), Bluetooth Low Energy (BLE)

Q&A
How can Furbo keep my dog safe?

Furbo has saved over 2800 dogs! Furbo will send you alerts of any important events happening at home, so you can be alerted of any emergencies in real time.

How is Furbo different from generic security cameras?

Every element of Furbo is designed for dogs. Furbo is recommended by vets and dog trainers and can help alleviate your dogâ€™s separation anxiety. Furbo's life-saving Smart Alerts can detect dog-related events and alert you about whatâ€™s happening at home.

Do I have to pay for Furbo Dog Nanny?

No, Furbo Dog Nanny is an OPTIONAL subscription service that you can choose to purchase after your 30-day FREE trial, included with your purchase, is over.

What treats can I use?

We recommend using dry, firm and round treats that are 0.5in for best treat-toss results!

Is Furbo suitable for large dogs?

During the development process of Furbo, many dogs of different sizes, breeds, and personalities tested out the sturdiness of Furbo. Thatâ€™s why you will find a fixed 3M doubled-sided tape on the bottom of your Furbo, to prevent it from being knocked over. We recommend placing Furbo 12-20 inches above the floor (or based on the height of your dog and its mobility).

What is the return policy?

If you are not fully satisfied with your Furbo, you will have 30 days to return or exchange your Furbo.

Does Furbo come with a warranty?

Yes! Furbo comes with a one year warranty starting from the date of shipping.
